    • Method Detail

      • getBestMove

        public java.util.ArrayList<ComputerMove> getBestMove(ChessBoard board,
                                            int noOfMoves,
                                            int color)
        Method for selecting the best possible move for the AI.

        This method is recursive, each following move being another call to this same method. Consecutive recursive calls will only modify the tactical value of a move. Every other recursive call will be to calculate a White move, and will give a negative tactical value.

        Parameters:
        board - A Chess Board to calculate from.
        noOfMoves - Number of moves to calculate.
        color - Color to be calculated.
        Returns:
        A list of all possible moves sorted by tactical value.
